name: part_005
file: tmp_【 #常闇トワ6周年記念LIVE 】ROCK Festa !!!【 3DLIVE 】 [pmWH-wAJYRE]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Tokoyami Towa and AZKi performing 'Chou-Chou Musubi' (Butterfly Knot) on stage with pink audience lights.
Tokoyami Towa and Tsunomaki Watame performing 'Hana ni Natte' (Become a Flower) with yellow and purple lighting effects.

subtitles.original: 片っぽでも引っ張っちゃえば ほどけちゃうけど
subtitles.english: If I pull just one end, it will unravel, but...

subtitles.original: 作ったもの壊すのは 遥かに簡単だけど
subtitles.english: It's far easier to destroy something you've made, but...

subtitles.original: だけどほどく時も そうちゃんと 同じようにね
subtitles.english: But when we untie it, let's do it properly, just the same way.

subtitles.original: 分かってるよ
subtitles.english: I know.

subtitles.original: でもできたらね せーので引っ張って
subtitles.english: But if we can, let's pull it together on the count of three.

subtitles.original: ほどけやしないようにと願って 力込めては
subtitles.english: Praying it won't come undone, I put all my strength into it.

subtitles.original: 広げすぎた羽根に
subtitles.english: With wings spread too wide,

subtitles.original: 戸惑う
subtitles.english: I feel bewildered.

subtitles.original: 羽根は大きく
subtitles.english: Make the wings big,

subtitles.original: 結び目は固く
subtitles.english: and the knot tight.

subtitles.original: なるようにきつく 結んでいて
subtitles.english: Tie it strictly so it becomes that way.

subtitles.original: ほしいの
subtitles.english: I want you to.

subtitles.original: 夢はここに
subtitles.english: Dreams are here,

subtitles.original: 思い出は遠くに
subtitles.english: and memories are far away.

subtitles.original: 日付はそこにあるくらいがいい
subtitles.english: It's better if the date is just simply there.

subtitles.original: 黙って引っ張ったりしないでよ
subtitles.english: Don't pull on it silently.

subtitles.original: 不格好な蝶にしないでよ
subtitles.english: Don't turn it into a misshapen butterfly.

subtitles.original: 結んだつもりが ほどいてたり
subtitles.english: Thinking we tied it, we were untying it,

subtitles.original: 緩めたつもりが 締めていたり
subtitles.english: Thinking we loosened it, we were tightening it.

subtitles.original: この蒼くて広い世界に
subtitles.english: In this pale and vast world,

subtitles.original: 無数に散らばった中から
subtitles.english: from among the countless scattered pieces,

subtitles.original: 別々に二人選んだ糸を
subtitles.english: the threads we each chose separately,

subtitles.original: お互い手繰り寄せ合ったんだ
subtitles.english: we reeled them in towards each other.

subtitles.original: 結ばれたんじゃなく 結んだんだ
subtitles.english: We weren't tied together; we tied it ourselves.

subtitles.original: 二人でせーので引っ張ったんだ
subtitles.english: We pulled it together on the count of three.

subtitles.original: 大きくも小さくもなりすぎないように
subtitles.english: So it wouldn't become too big or too small,

subtitles.original: 力を込めたんだ
subtitles.english: we put our strength into it.

subtitles.original: この蒼くて広い世界に
subtitles.english: In this pale and vast world,

subtitles.original: 無数に散らばった中から
subtitles.english: from among the countless scattered pieces,

subtitles.original: 別々に二人選んだ糸を
subtitles.english: the threads we each chose separately,

subtitles.original: お互い手繰り寄せ合ったんだ
subtitles.english: we reeled them in towards each other.

subtitles.original: 結ばれたんじゃなく 結んだんだ
subtitles.english: We weren't tied together; we tied it ourselves.

subtitles.original: 二人でせーので引っ張ったんだ
subtitles.english: We pulled it together on the count of three.

subtitles.original: 大きくも小さくもなりすぎないように
subtitles.english: So it wouldn't become too big or too small,

subtitles.original: 力を込めたんだ
subtitles.english: we put our strength into it.

subtitles.original: 陰にそっと隠れるのがいいんじゃない？
subtitles.english: Isn't it fine to just hide softly in the shadows?

subtitles.original: 蕾のような花だってあんじゃない
subtitles.english: There are flowers that are like buds, aren't there?

subtitles.original: 秘密にして守るのがいいんじゃない？
subtitles.english: Isn't it fine to keep it a secret and protect it?

subtitles.original: 誰にも邪魔されず 華麗に咲いてる
subtitles.english: Blooming magnificently without being disturbed by anyone.

subtitles.original: 甘い苦いにハマんない
subtitles.english: Don't get caught up in sweet or bitter.

subtitles.original: その判断がくだんない
subtitles.english: Those judgments are worthless.

subtitles.original: 気に病んで下を向かないでいて
subtitles.english: Don't worry yourself sick and look down.

subtitles.original: 愛になれちゃいない
subtitles.english: You haven't gotten used to love.

subtitles.original: 無駄に飾らない
subtitles.english: Don't decorate yourself needlessly.

subtitles.original: 綺麗にされた花瓶も
subtitles.english: A beautifully prepared vase,

subtitles.original: 肥やしもなにもいらない
subtitles.english: fertilizer, or anything else—you don't need them.

subtitles.original: その姿が美しい
subtitles.english: That figure of yours is beautiful.

subtitles.original: 花になって
subtitles.english: Become a flower.

subtitles.original: ほら右左に笑って
subtitles.english: Look, smile to the right and left.

subtitles.original: その顔にぞくぞくして目が離せない
subtitles.english: That face gives me chills, I can't look away.

subtitles.original: 味見して
subtitles.english: Have a taste.

subtitles.original: 君の毒は私の薬って
subtitles.english: Your poison is my medicine,

subtitles.original: 包んであげた
subtitles.english: I wrapped it up for you.
